message: The bottom line is the Republican people have spoken for Trump. To try and replace the people's choice will destroy the Republican Party as we know it. Plus, I for one, will cross parties to make sure the Republican Establishment fail.
shrinked_message: The bottom line is the Republican people have spoken for Trump. To try and replace the people's choice will destroy the Republican Party as we know it. Plus, I for one, will cross parties to make sure the Republican Establishment fail.

message: Bad cops have been killing kids for decades. They just got caught on video doing it. They want the judgement to be deemed reasonable because it means they are unaccountable. I don't know how either officer can hold their head up after murdering a child like that. Sorry but there are bad cops.

message:
I'm tired of watching the figureheads of the so called 'Party of Responsibility' squirm out of taking responsibility for anything. A man who raises his hand against a woman wasn't raised to respect women. It has nothing to do with PTSD or anything else. And if he had emotional problems,
[...Content omitted due to length constraints...]
go away. Palin is a crappy mother. Her daughter is a duplicitous ho-bag, her son is a nasty, entitled, bad tempered piece of shit that gets in trouble with the law because he has had no discipline or accountability. And Sarah Palin is as dumb as a sack of rocks.
